name: Reversword
description:
Your health is constantly decreasing
Gems give you back health and increase your score
Bats give you a little health



Controls  :

WASD  /  ZQSD  /  Arrow keys   =   Movement

C  /  K   =   Plant Sword  /  Call it back

Space    =   Restart

Like what you see ? :) Follow me on Twitter Join our Discord
